name: Streets of Age: Crime city 3D
description:
Undeground battles are ready to choose new champions. Fighting with the contenders in the new Beat Em Up, build your way through the street of age and get a title worthy of the champions. Combine the fighting from wrestling into a chain of combos, like in classic Beat Em Up; become the best in the street of age and learn new methods of wrestling to remain the best of champions. A street of age will make the best of you in fighting. a large set of methods of wrestling will help you become the best among the champions in this fascinating Beat Em Up.

* The street of rage is waiting for you
* Furious battles
* Fighting straight from wrestling
* Champions from all over the world
